Name: home
Title: AidIQ.com | Intelligent Business Solutions for the Humanitarian Community
Body:
Intelligent Business Solutions
for the Humanitarian Community

AidIQ provides information management solutions to organisations in the humanitarian, development, disaster and emergency management sectors.

We have extensive experience working for NGOs in both the field and headquarters and bring together a unique combination of experience in humanitarian response, disaster management, human resources and software development.

We provide a full range of services to clients to ensure that solutions are implemented effectively and sustainably:

  • Business Analysis
  • Process Design
  • Software Development
  • Training Design
  • Capacity Building
  • Human Resources

We believe in using participatory methodologies in all of our work to ensure we deliver sustainable solutions which empower people.

AidIQ is an active supporter of the free and open source
SAHANA Disaster Management Software
and specializes in developing solutions using Sahana Eden.
